Text:
Hi, it seems to work BUT I have a modded console with the WiiKey Wii Mod Chip. When I insert this game it tells me the system will update my bios and if it finds a modded bios it will delete it. I didn't make the update. Has someone else done it ? Or is there a way to get around this problem ?
Thank you.
Maybe I must have the new "DriveKey" modification ?
